pageTitle: Deputy Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Tuesday, April 28, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

The Deputy Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet Committee on the federal response to the coronavirus disease (COVID-19).

Closed to media.

12:00 p.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will attend the virtual sitting of the House of Commons.
